name: end-to-end-pipeline-jenkins
desc: This project successfully demonstrates a complete industry-level application deployment, utilizing various DevOps tools.

name: End-to-End-devops-project
desc: This project successfully demonstrates a complete, end-to-end DevOps workflow, automating the entire lifecycle of a cloud-native Go application. By integrating key technologies like Kubernetes, Argo CD for GitOps, and Prometheus for observability, it establishes a robust, secure, and scalable production environment.

name: End-to-End-pipeline-jenkins
desc: This repository outlines building and automating an end-to-end CI/CD pipeline. It fetches code from a GitHub repository, builds it, performs static code analysis, containerizes the application with Docker, and deploys it to a Kubernetes cluster managed by Argo CD.
